This is not only NOT the same skirt, completely different material but this is a medium just like I purchased last time yet it's a LOT larger. I’m gna try to post a photo later. I bought this bcos I have an upcoming interview. I actually have a pencil skirt from Express but they fit too tight on me and it has high slit on the back which is a big no for an interview. So I said I want a skirt that nicely fit not too tight and I could actually wear stockings under and be able to move around with no problem. I’m 5’1 1/2 and 125 lbs. small would probably fit me nicely but I don’t want it to be tight so I bought medium which is perfect and so comfortable. For me if you’re going to an interview you definitely wna look conservative.  Ladies, I guess it’s your preference. If you have same height and weight as me, buy small if you want it to be flattering and fit. Buy medium if you want to be comfortable and if u don’t mind it being a slightly loose on you. I have an upcoming interview and I wanted to wear a black skirt suit. However, my black blazer that I wanted to wear didn’t come with a skirt. I found this one as the materials were the same materials the blazer are made up of. I’ve gained some weight, so now I’m a size 12/14. After reading reviews I went with a XXL. It is a bit loose, but not too loose to send back. If I ordered the XL, it would probably fit to inappropriately for a job interview but would be perfect for a date! Since I have a nice size bottom and thick thighs, the XXL will work. It’s super comfortable and I could wear it all day long! Hopefully this is be a staple in my closet for a long time and when I loose weight, I’ll order a new size. That’s just how much I like it! The material is a silky smooth material and I don’t feel like it’s cheap at all. Beauty is in the eye of the beholder!
